text: Kare-ra wa itta. `Shuaibu yo, anata no inoru tokoro no mono wa, watashi-tachi no sosen ga suhai shita mono o suteru yo ni anata ni meijita no ka. Mata jibun no zaisan ni kanshi, nozomi-dori ni shori shite wa naranai no ka. Hontoni anata wa, shinsetsu ni tadashi michi ni michibiku monona no ka
